content: looking for a fun and easy fall crochet pattern check out this new crochet scarecrow gnome and add some personal touch to your fall decorations this year haven t heard of crochet monthly gnome along read about it here > a free version of the pattern can be found here 1 september is known as the harvest month and i thought what should i crochet for this month s gnome a scarecrow a pumpkin maybe a mushroom we already shared the crochet fall pumpkin gnome with you so it is time for the scarecrow to be added to the fall collection the listing is for the pdf pattern not the actual toy the pattern is written in english with us crochet terms in the pdf pattern you will find step-by-step instructions on how to crochet a halloween gnome and plenty of pictures to guide you through materials -sport weight yarn -crochet hook size 2 5mm -poly fiber fill for stuffing -tapestry needle if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact us via etsy 1 https //www passionatecrafter com/crochet-fall-gnome-pattern-free-the-scarecrow-gnome/
